name: CIA Anti-Terrorist Detail
description: A game of counter-intelligence. The National Security Agency (NSA) has intercepted a cryptic message from a strange organization -- one they never heard of. They believe it may be from a terrorist organization. They cannot decode the message and they need your help. There are lost parts of a cipher machine that must be found. There are traps, puzzles, riddles, cryptic messages and strange surroundings, as you, a special agent for the CIA undertake a top secret assignment to break the code, decipher the message, and find out who and what this organization is. (For help, a walk-through is included.)
